casebody.data:
COMMSCOPE CREDIT UNION
v.
BUTLER AND BURKE, LLP, et al. No. 5PA15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 25, 2016. Alfred P. Carlton, Jr., Raleigh, for Commscope Credit Union. L. Oliver Noble, Jr., Hickory, for Commscope Credit Union. Michael Joseph Barnett, for Commscope Credit Union. Frederick K. Sharpless, Greensboro, for Butler & Burke, LLP. Christopher Carlisle Lam, Charlotte, for Graham, Barry D., et al. Camden R. Webb, Raleigh, for Pope, Todd, et al. J. Mitchell Armbruster, Raleigh, for NCACPA, AICPA, and Center for Audit Quality. Michael W. Mitchell, Raleigh, for NCACPA, AICPA, and Center for Audit Quality. Lauren H. Bradley, Raleigh, for NCACPA, AICPA, and Center for Audit Quality. Brent F. Powell, Winston-Salem, for Cherry Bekaert LLP, et al. C. Mark Wiley, Winston-Salem, for Cherry Bekaert LLP, et al. Michael R. Cashin, Winston-Salem, for at Law, For Cherry Bekaert LLP, et al. Mel J. Garofalo, Charlotte, for N.C. Chamber. Noel L. Allen, Raleigh, for National Association of State Boards of Accountancy. Nathan E. Standley, for National Association of State Boards of Accountancy. Ashley E. Eiler, for Butler & Burke, LLP. Richard A. Simpson, for Butler & Burke, LLP. Brian D. Boone, Charlotte, for Chamber of Commerce of the USA. Ian S. Richardson, for Commscope Credit Union. James C. Smith, for Graham, Barry D., et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 19th of April 2016 by Third Party Defendants to Substitute Counsel:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 25th of April 2016."
